lead_paragraph: Hall of Fame broadcaster Vin Scully will receive the Presidential Medal of Freedom on Tuesday at the White House.

headline.main: Scully, Jordan, Abdul-Jabbar to Receive Medal of Freedom
headline.print_headline: Scully, Jordan, Abdul-Jabbar to Receive Medal of Freedom
